content: to end of round 12 sts remain round 15 and 16 *k2 p2* 4 times k to end of round round 18 k2tog to end of round 6 sts decreased 6 sts round 17 k18 sm kfb k9 kfb sm k to end of round remain round 18 k round 19 *k2 p2* 4 times k to end of round cut an 8 20 cm tail of yarn and thread through the round 20 *k2 p2* 4 times k2 slip the next 13 sts remaining stitches pull closed and weave in end onto waste yarn to be picked up later for the thumb rejoin for working in the round k to end of round finishing both hands lightly block the finished mittens to allow the wool this section maintains the basketweave texture on to soften and bloom the top of the mitten hand while the palm underside is worked in smooth stockinette stitch round 21 and 22 k round 23 and 24 *k2 p2* 4 times k to end of round repeat rnds 21-24 six more times ending with round 48 round 49 and 50 k round 51 k1 ssk p1 *k2 p2* 2 times k2 p1 k2tog k2 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 4 sts decreased 32 sts remain round 52 k1 p2 *k2 p2* 3 times k to end of round round 53 k1 ssk k10 k2tog k2 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 4 sts decreased 28 sts remain round 54 k round 55 k1 ssk k1 p2 k2 p2 k1 k2tog k2 ssk knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 4 sts decreased 24 sts remain round 56 k3 *p2 k2* 2 times k to end of round round 57 k1 ssk k6 k2tog k2 ssk k6 k2tog k1 4 sts decreased 20 sts remain round 58 k1 ssk k4 k2tog k2 ssk k4 k2tog k1 4 sts decreased 16 sts remain page 2
